  • Method Details

    • getDirection

      public java.lang.String getDirection()
      Gets the direction.
      Returns:
      the direction

    • addPoint

      public void addPoint​(Point p)
      Adds the point in Line
      Parameters:
      p - : point to be included in the line

    • lineSize

      public int lineSize()
      Line size.
      Returns:
      the line size

    • direction

      public void direction​(int dirX, int dirY)
      Set up the direction of the line. HORI : left/right RISE : bottomleft/upright FALL : upleft/bottomright VERTI : up/bottom
      Parameters:
      dirX - : 1 for HORI, RISE, and FALL, 0 for VERTI
      dirY - : 0 for HORI, -1 for RISE, 1 for FALL and VERTI

    • getPoint

      public Point getPoint​(int i)
      Gets the point at the i line index
      Parameters:
      i - : line index
      Returns:
      Linepoint(i)

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Make the Object Line empty

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Draw the line in our graphic interface source : https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/awt/Graphics.html
      Parameters:
      g - : Graphics class

    • copy

      public Line copy()
      Copy this line into a new one.
      Returns:
      the new line using function : checkLine()

    • setclickedPoint

      public void setclickedPoint​(Point cp)
      Sets the clicked point. Useful for remember the point clicked when player has to chose between propositions.
      Parameters:
      cp - : the movepoint clicked by the user using function : checkLine()

    • getclickedPoint

      public Point getclickedPoint()
      Gets the clicked point.
      Returns:
      the movepoint clicked by the user
